services.name: Web Applications
services.description: Modern, responsive web applications built with cutting-edge technologies

services.name: API Development
services.description: Robust backend services and RESTful APIs for your applications

faqs.question: What technologies do you use for web development?
faqs.answer: We use modern frameworks like React, Vue.js, and Angular for frontend, Node.js, Python (Django/FastAPI), and .NET for backend, with databases like PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Redis.

faqs.question: Do you build mobile-responsive applications?
faqs.answer: Yes, all our web applications are built with mobile-first design principles and are fully responsive across all devices and screen sizes.

faqs.question: Can you integrate with existing systems?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We specialize in integrating with existing CRMs, ERPs, payment gateways, third-party APIs, and legacy systems through robust API connections.

faqs.question: Do you provide hosting and deployment services?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer cloud deployment on AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud with automated CI/CD pipelines, monitoring, and maintenance services.

faqs.question: What is your development process?
faqs.answer: We follow Agile methodology with regular sprints, daily standups, and continuous delivery. You'll have access to staging environments and regular progress updates.
